altername_name: Super Mario Bros 64 Enhanced for the 128
name: Super Mario Bros 128
overview: This is a Commodore 64 port of the 1985 game SUPER MARIO BROS. for the Famicom and Nintendo Entertainment System. It contains the original version that was released in Japan and United States, as well as the European version. It has been enhanced for the C128. It also detects and supports a handful of turbo functionalities, and has 2 SID support. - select a version of the game. - disable turbo (if detected). - configure a second SID-chip. - see the background (based on Shigeru Miyamotos artwork that was used for the Japanese and European release).
